column1: A fallen knight cursed to wander in eternal darkness.
A dragon born from the fiery core of the earth.
An undead sorcerer trapped in eternal winter.
A giant beast ruling the darkest ocean depths.
A serpentine ruler with toxic breath and multiple heads.
A mysterious entity from the void between worlds.
A giantess who commands the power of storms.
A dragon with scales that shimmer like the stars.
A prince turned necromancer, seeking eternal life.
A fiery demoness with a mane of burning embers.
